name: Jennifer Woodward
detail: Jennifer Woodward is also known for her other roles as Faye Stafford in Moonshot, Miss July in Battlefield: Bad Company, and Shani / Carmen in The Witcher. She also appeared a short while in Sex and the City as a cashier.
